page.title: 20GROUP IN SURVEY OF CURY
page.content: Teacher i/c Mr.A.Butler assisted by Mrs.E.Carter - Teaching Aide. Other teachers were Mrs. Langley and Miss Plummer. Parents and friends who also helped were:- Mrs Rosevear, Mrs Reay, Mrs Real, Mrs Pay, Mrs Osborne and Mr Davis. Children involved in the project were:- David Barber,Garreth Cowan,Helen Cornet,Adam Dyer,Aubrey Fisher,Caroline Gleisner,Kent Green, Joanna Goldsmith,Andrew Guthrie,Nicola Horspool,Mark Hill,Janice Kelly,Sarah Lewis,Jonathan Millen,Craig Morley, Carrie Ann Millar,Kevin Murgatroyd, Treana Morris,Simon Morgan, Leon Morgan,David Nancarrow,Claire Parker, Martyn Rosevear,Michael Rothery,Susan Swaine,Oliver Smith,Samuel Scott, Louise Woodhead,Sharen Williams,Sarah Weller, Simon Bond and Matthew Warrington. All thoroughly enjoyed doing this project.
